system.description:
You have combined a talent for misdirection and subterfuge with elemental magic. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining your Sneak Attack damage.
  • Half your rogue levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining your Elemental Blast damage.
  • When you deal bonus damage with Sneak Attack, you can choose to have that bonus damage be of a type your Elemental Blast could deal.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Elementalist, 3 levels in Rogue
